name: SLENDERMAN pages
description:
Reminder, follow 8080 for notifications on updates ! Let's keep Amiga alive and prosper!

Your payment/tip is a contribution for my Amiga projects ;)

SLENDERMAN pages

(Source code AmiBlitz3 included, why not modify it to your own game)

Your friends are challenging you to collect all pages in the woods that has a spell to stop slenderman, if you believe in such thing!   Do you accept the challenge ?  

Game looks/behaves 3D, there is no 3D engine ;) 

Jumpscare/survival Horror 

Control: WS for move (lshift-run), AD rotate, E action, P pause

In menu: Change Level with L

Requirements:  Only tested on emulated Amiga

AmigaOS 3.x, RTG 640x360x24, AHI, min: 68040/060 with FPU 50MIPS

This is my third game done with Amiblitz3, Don't expect a supergame
